mapper.insert: insert into petserviceregister (petName, masterName, tel, itemFirst, itemSecond, startTime, endTime, petAge, petGender, selfGood, remark, times, state, payment, sevPrice ) values (#{petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mastername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{petage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petgender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfgood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sevprice,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update petserviceregister set petName = #{petname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, masterName = #{mastername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemFirst = #{itemfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemSecond = #{itemsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, petAge = #{petage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, petGender = #{petgender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, selfGood = #{selfgood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sevPrice = #{sevprice,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, petName, masterName, tel, itemFirst, itemSecond, startTime, endTime, petAge, petGender, selfGood, remark, times, state, payment, sevPrice from petserviceregister where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
